Trigger.Name: TR_USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = 'c0c3662a-2586-4104-a1db-638e9e9950b0'; end
